title: Ep. 208: To Fight Clutter, Beware the “Endowment Effect”
description:
This week, we’ll talk about why you should beware the “endowment effect” as a way to combat clutter, and we’ll take a deep dive into listeners’ one-word themes for the year.
We also discuss listener responses to the “Try This at Home” from episode 204 to “put a band-aid on it.”
Happiness hack from a listener: challenge myself to make the most of my wardrobe and wear a different outfit every day.
Get in touch on Instagram: @GretchenRubin & @LizCraft
Get the resources and all links related to this episode here: http://happiercast.com/208
Get the podcast show notes by email every week here: http://gretchenrubin.com/#newsletter
If you pre-ordered Gretchen’s new book Outer Order, Inner Calm, get your preorder bonuses here: http://outerorderinnercalmbook.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
